title: 1033 Program transfer to Puerto Rican Agencies

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A list of all equipment and details about equipment, agency and date of transfer for equipment transferred to Puerto Rico law enforcement agencies through the 1033 program since January 1, 2014. Data that satisfies this request should include the following fields:

* Name of equipment item
* Description of equipment item (if different than name)
* NSN code for the item
* A description of the unit to use for the item
* The number of units of the item transferred to the agency
* Name of law enforcement agency that received the item
* County of the agency that received the unit
* The per-unit cost of the item for the military
* Date when the item was shipped to a law enforcement agency

I request that this information be provided in structured data files in a tabular format such as comma separated value (.csv extension) or Microsoft Excel (.xls or .xlsx extensions.)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco
